description: The Tamil romantic comedy Mr Housekeeping, starring Losliya Mariyanesan and Hari Bhaskar, is now streaming on Aha Tamil. Directed by Arun Ravichandran, the film revolves around a young man who takes a housekeeping job at his former college mate’s home, leading to unexpected situations. The movie, produced by Sri Thenandal Films and Invate Media, is available to watch with an OTTplay Premium subscription. Cinematography is by Kulothungavarman R, editing by Rama Subbu, and music by Osho Venkat.
title: Mr Housekeeping Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: Everything You Need to Know

description: GUILTY GEAR STRIVE: DUAL RULERS, an anime adaptation of the iconic fighting game, lands on Crunchyroll in April 2025. Set in a world where magic has replaced science, the story follows Sin Kiske as he navigates tensions between humans and Gears. Directed by Shigeru Morikawa with scripts by Norimitsu Kaiho, the series promises an action-packed expansion of the franchise’s deep lore. Fans worldwide—except in Japan, China, and Korea—can stream it exclusively on Crunchyroll.
title: Guilty Gear Strive: Dual Rulers OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The AMoRE experiment has made significant progress in refining the limits of neutrinoless double beta decay using molybdenum-100. While AMoRE-I set a new upper limit on the decay halflife, no clear signal was observed. The next phase, AMoRE-II, is being developed at Yemilab with enhanced detection systems to further explore this rare nuclear process. The research contributes to understanding neutrinos and their role in the matter-antimatter balance.
title: AMoRE Experiment Sets New Benchmark in Neutrinoless Double Beta Decay Research

description: A study suggests that Hawking radiation, first proposed by Stephen Hawking, may have influenced the universe’s structure. According to reports, primordial black holes that existed in the early universe could have evaporated through Hawking radiation, impacting matter distribution. The research explores how these black holes might have shaped galaxies and cosmic structures. Although no direct evidence has been found, scientists believe future observations could confirm their role in cosmology and particle physics.
title: Did Black Hole Radiation Shape the Universe?

description: After its theatrical release on February 28, 2025, Aghathiyaa is now arriving on Sun NXT for its OTT premiere on March 28, 2025. Directed by Pa. Vijay, the film features Jeeva, Raashi Khanna, and Arjun Sarja in pivotal roles. The story revolves around a battle between divine forces, blending supernatural elements with intense action. With Yuvan Shankar Raja’s music and Deepak Kumar Padhy’s cinematography, the film has been noted for its striking visuals and compelling narrative.
title: Aghathiyaa Tamil Fantasy Thriller Now Streaming on Sun NXT

description: Google Pixel 9a will be available for purchase in India starting April 16. It is priced at Rs. 49,999 for the sole 8GB RAM and 256GB storage option. The phone will be available in three colour options in the country. It is equipped with the Tensor G4 processor, a Titan M2 co-processor, and features an upgraded rear camera setup. The Pixel 9a also gets a redesign and packs a 5,100mAh battery with 23W fast charging support.
title: Google Pixel 9a Sale Date Revealed; to Be Available for Purchase in India Starting April 16

description: NASA’s Artemis II Orion spacecraft is a step closer to its mission around the Moon. Three spacecraft adapter jettison fairings have been installed on its service module at Kennedy Space Center. These panels will protect the solar arrays from heat, wind, and acoustic forces during launch. Once in space, they will detach, allowing the arrays to deploy. The mission will take four astronauts on a 10-day journey, testing Orion’s capabilities for deep-space travel. This marks a key milestone in NASA’s push for future lunar and Mars exploration.
title: Artemis II Orion Service Module Secured for Launch at Kennedy Space Center

description: Zakir Khan’s Delulu Express is set to premiere on Prime Video on March 27, 2025. The stand-up special explores everyday struggles, relationships, and personal experiences with his signature wit. The trailer teases a hilarious take on life’s absurdities, making it one of the most awaited comedy specials of the year. Fans can expect an entertaining set filled with Zakir’s relatable storytelling and sharp observations.
title: Zakir Khan’s Delulu Express Stand-Up Special Now Streaming on Prime Video

description: NASA is conducting a rocket experiment from Poker Flat Research Range in Alaska. Three rockets will launch within a three-hour window to study how auroral substorms influence the Earth's upper atmosphere. Scientists will observe whether auroras drive vertical convection or if acoustic-buoyancy waves spread their energy over a wider region. Vapour tracers released at various altitudes will help track these movements. The findings may lead to better space weather predictions, benefiting satellite and communication systems worldwide. The launch window is open from 24 March to 6 April.
title: NASA to Launch Three Rockets in Alaska to Study Auroral Substorms’ Impact

description: Archaeologists have uncovered a 3,200-year-old tomb at Tell el-Maschuta in northeastern Egypt. The tomb, which includes a burial chamber and three adjoining rooms, holds artifacts such as a gold ring inscribed with the name of Ramesses III and bronze arrowheads. Pottery inscriptions referring to Horemheb suggest possible reuse of the tomb over different periods. Experts are calling for further analysis to determine whether the tomb originally belonged to a military commander or was repurposed over time
title: Archaeologists Discover a 3,200-Year-Old Tomb Possibly Linked to Ramesses III

description: A partial solar eclipse will take place on March 29, 2025, visible across parts of Europe, Africa, and North America. The event will reach its peak in Nunavik, Canada, where 94% of the sun will be covered at sunrise. From space, weather satellites like GOES-16 and Himawari will capture images of the moon’s shadow. The International Space Station may also provide views of the event. The moon’s shadow will move west to east, appearing darkest over the Atlantic Ocean.
title: Partial Solar Eclipse of March 2025: Satellite Images to Show Moon’s Shadow
